Posts.EditableText:
I try to run my new game, but there is an error.

Error found in C:\(directory)\Quest\inferni1.asl:
 \-----LDF-Error: Unspecified: errors:help-----/
Unable to open C:\(directory)\Quest\inferni1.asl.

Please help.
Posts.HTML:
I try to run my new game, but there is an error.

Error found in C:\(directory)\Quest\inferni1.asl:
\-----LDF-Error: Unspecified: errors:help-----/
Unable to open C:\(directory)\Quest\inferni1.asl.

Please help.

Posts.EditableText: LDF's are the quest files for supporting different languages, is your game translated or something?
Posts.HTML: LDF's are the quest files for supporting different languages, is your game translated or something?

Posts.EditableText: That was a bug fixed in version 3.51, available for download now. The error message should read "Read logfile (if enabled) for details".
Posts.HTML: That was a bug fixed in version 3.51, available for download now. The error message should read "Read logfile (if enabled) for details".
